title: Glottography dataset derived from Tarble de Scaramelli and Zucchi 1984 "Nuevos Datos sobre la Arqueología Tardia del Orinoco: La Serie Valloide"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping, traditional language ranges in Amazonia based on maps 6 and 7 in Scaramelli and Zucchi 1984.
citation: Scaramelli, Kay Tarble de & A. Zucchi. 1984. Nuevos Datos sobre la Arqueología Tardia del Orinoco: La Serie Valloide. Acta Científica Venezolana 35. 434-445.
